document.full_text: the london stock exchange group, which made a friendly all-share bid for the tmx group in february, said it "remains committed" to its offer in the face of a rival proposal from a group of canadian financial institutions.
document.title: canadian banks make rival bid for toronto exchange
lines_and_colors: the london stock exchange group, which made a friendly all-share bid for the tmx group in february, said it "remains committed" to its offer in the face of a rival proposal from a group of canadian financial institutions.
